| History                 = The Starry Wisdom Cult was a sect worshipping the [[Nyarlathotep (Earth-616)|Haunter of the Dark]], which could be awakened by gazing into the [[Shining Trapezohedron]], a stone and jewel said to have been brought to [[Earth]] by the [[Great Old Ones|Old Ones]], later worshiped in [[Atlantis (Empire)|Atlantis]], then acquired by the pharaoh [[Nephren-Ka (Earth-616)|Nephren-Ka]], whose evil rule caused his name to be stricken from all records).<!-- {{r|Journey into Mystery Vol 2 4|; The Haunter of the Dark}} -->

In the middle of the 19th century, they took over the church at the top of [[Federal Hill]], in [[Providence (Rhode Island)|Providence]]. After the stone was found by archaelogists, it eventually became the property of the cult, who worshiped it. The cult also possessed the dreaded [[Necronomicon]]. They wrote their records in code using the [[Aklo]] language.<!-- {{r|Journey into Mystery Vol 2 4|; The Haunter of the Dark}} -->

Their strange rites and rumors of blood sacrifice caused them to be driven from town in the 1880's.{{r|Journey into Mystery Vol 2 4|; The Haunter of the Dark}}
